notification_system.description: Two notifications alternate every 30 seconds after initial staggered start

ios_requirements.note: Uses maximum available local notification features for screen wake

testing_steps: 6. Screen should wake with each notification

troubleshooting.no_screen_wake: Check notification settings in iOS Settings > Notifications > [App] - ensure Lock Screen is enabled
troubleshooting.no_sound: Check device silent switch and notification sound settings
troubleshooting.permissions_denied: Direct user to iOS Settings to enable notifications manually
